Original Sin Story ―Complete Edition―

原(げん)罪(ざい)物(もの)語(がたり)　(　)―(―)完(かん)全(ぜん)版(ばん)―(―)genzai monogatari —kanzen-ban—

AKNP-0009

"Who is the snake?"

mothy's twelfth album that focuses on the Original Sin Story series including the songs from Original Sin Story ―Act 1― and Original Sin Story ―Act 2― released on August 16, 2015. The album is licensed through KARENT and is available on Apple Music, Amazon, and Spotify.

Trailer (niconico) · Crossfade (YouTube) · Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. Prophet Merry-Go-Round
  2. Queen Of The Glass
  3. Project "Ma"
  4. Escape of Salmhofer the Witch
  5. moonlit bear
  6. Barisol's Child is an Only Child
  7. "Ma" Survival
  8. Whereabouts of the Miracle
  9. Recollective Musicbox
  10. The Song I Heard Somewhere
  11. Tale of Abandonment on a Moonlit Night
  12. Chrono Story

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • Along with the seven songs from the previous Original Sin Story albums and the two old songs in Act 3, new songs were added to Act 1, the Entr'acte, and Act 3.
  • The beginning of each act includes character profiles for some of the featured characters along with explanations of some related terms.
